label: instructionCode
comment: A code specifying an instruction for these trade payment terms.
A code specifying an instruction for this logistics packaging.
A code specifying an instruction for this supply chain packaging.

domainIncludes.comment: Any wrapping or containment, such as a box or a barrel, whether or not any goods are contained within.
Terms and conditions by which payment has been or will be made for trade purposes.
Any material with which supply chain goods are packaged, such as a box or bubble wrap.
